thread.title: BRIEF-Puma Exploration And Trevali Mining Corp Enter Into Strategic Development And Exploration Alliance

title: BRIEF-Puma Exploration And Trevali Mining Corp Enter Into Strategic Development And Exploration Alliance

organizations.name: ategic development and exploration alliance reuters

text: March 2, 2018 / 2:29 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Puma Exploration And Trevali Mining Corp Enter Into Strategic Development And Exploration Alliance Reuters Staff March 2 (Reuters) - Puma Exploration Inc: * PUMA EXPLORATION AND TREVALI MINING CORPORATION ENTER INTO STRATEGIC DEVELOPMENT AND EXPLORATION ALLIANCE * PUMA EXPLORATION INC - UNDER TERMS OF LOI, TREVALI WILL PROVIDE UP TO 7.5 MILLION DOLLARS FUNDING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
